title: Malena's Kiss
description: James Francis just inherited a house from his crazy Aunt Margaret; a towering, dilapidated, 18th century New England Colonial … in some creepy backwoods town called Cutler Hollow.Deep in the belly of an old backyard leach pit he uncovers a rusty iron chest, sealed with a lock, bound in chains, and inscribed with bizarre Celtic symbols.He raises the chest with dreams of gold coins, precious jewels, and sterling silverware. And unleashes Cutler Hollow’s darkest secret ... Malena
author: Paul DiPersio
